content.question: Which of the following helps explain the process depicted in the excerpt?

choices.label: African leaders primarily enslaved individuals from their own ethnic groups to maintain political dominance.
Interior states in Africa became wealthier as they provided captives for the slave trade.
Societies in Africa became more stable during warfare as new leaders rose to power.
The slave trade increased monetary incentives to use violence against neighboring societies in Africa.

content.answer: The slave trade increased monetary incentives to use violence against neighboring societies in Africa.

topic.text: 2.3: Capture and the Impact of the Slave Trade on West African Societies

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
